attributes.action: Stop Cardiff & Vale NHS Trust Punishing Whistle-blowers!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This Trust BANS Whistleblowers from visiting relatives &/or friends and from entering any NHS Trust Hospital..

(evidenced) 


We the undersigned find this an affront to Article 10,Freedom of Speech (ECHR) & an abuse of Power...

Thank you


Nadia Feldmeier - Human Rights Campaigner

rejection.details: I realise your petition is more specific, but please see this petition which is similar to your own. http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/whistleblow/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
